member.name: CRYPT_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS
member.summary: The CRYPT_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS structure contains the parameters for an RSAES-OAEP key encryption. This structure is used with the PKCS_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS and szOID_RSAES_OAEP encoding types.

member.name: CRYPT_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that identifies the hash algorithm to use. If this is not set for encoding, the default algorithm is szOID_OIWSEC_sha1.

member.name: CRYPT_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS.MaskGenAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that identifies the mask generation function to use. If this is not set for encoding, the default algorithm is szOID_RSA_MGF1 with the mask generation hash algorithm defaulting to the algorithm specified by the HashAlgorithm member.

member.name: CRYPT_RSAES_OAEP_PARAMETERS.PSourceAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains the source of, and possibly the value of, the label to be used. If this is not set for encoding, the default algorithm is szOID_RSA_PSPECIFIED with no OCTET bytes.
